mapper.update:
UPDATE refundment
order_code = #{orderCode},
return_code = #{returnCode},
refundment_code = #{refundmentCode},
amount = #{amount},
channel = #{channel},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
refundment_time = #{refundmentTime},
voucher = #{voucher},
refundment_status = #{refundmentStatus},
refundment_type = #{refundmentType},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
